abilitydescription: When hitting an enemy that is not facing him, Aladdin inflicts a Wound dealing 25% Damage each second for 4 seconds. [Max Stacks: 3]
When Aladdin dashes through a Wounded enemy he delivers an additional basic hit, dealing 50% Damage.
Aladdin deals 400% Damage to his current target and inflicts Knock Back.
Aladdin inflicts a Wound dealing 25% Damage each second for 8 seconds.
If the enemy is already Wounded, Aladdin also inflicts a Stun for 3 seconds.
Aladdin has a 100% chance to Purge an Attribute Buff when dashing through a Wounded enemy.
If a Buff is Purged this way Aladdin gains a 50% Attack Buff for 6 seconds. [Max Stacks: 3]

talents.talentdescription: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.
Grants +20% Focus at the start of an encounter.
Wounds inflicted by Aladdin last 4 second(s) longer.
Aladdin deals an additional 50% Critical Damage when attacking an enemy activating a Heavy or Special Ability.
When Aladdin dashes through a Wounded or Stunned enemy, he has a 100% chance to gain a 20% Focus Buff for 5 seconds. [Max Stacks: 1]
Aladdin’s Special Ability grants a Shadow Buff, greatly lowering the enemy's aggression towards Aladdin and granting their attacks a 50% chance to Miss for 5 seconds.
